DOC.brief_summary: Prospective , two-arm , randomize study effectiveness BTL-9000 HFT achieve 3 cm great average waist circumferential reduction HFT group subject relative base line 1 cm great reduction relative average waist circumferential reduction Placebo group .
DOC.brief_title: BTL-9000 High Frequency Therapy Waist Circumferential Reduction
DOC.detailed_description: Prospective , randomize , blind , two-arms study waist circumferential reduction follow 5 once-a-week treatment . One arm HFT group 64 subject treat BTL-9000 HFT arm Placebo group 38 subject treat sham device . The objective study demonstrate effectiveness BTL-9000 HFT treatment achieve average post-treatment waist circumference reduction 3 cm great across waistline relative baseline assessment 1 cm great average waist circumferential reduction Placebo group .

Subjects willing able abstain partake treatment study procedure promote body contour and/or weight loss study participation . Subjects willing able maintain his/her regular ( preprocedure ) diet exercise regimen without effect significant change either direction study participation . Diabetics dependent insulin oral hypoglycemic medication Known cardiovascular disease arrhythmia , congestive heart failure Cardiac surgeries cardiac bypass , heart transplant surgery , pacemaker . Implanted electronic device cardiac pacemaker , bladder stimulator , spinal cord stimulator electrodes myoelectric prosthesis , etc .
